The '''Mojang Office Cape''' is a [[cape]] which was obtainable by completing all five daily challenges in the [[Eerie Mojang Office Party]].

== Appearance ==
The cape's design includes one large, opened [[eyeblossom]] as the centerpiece with additional, smaller eyeblossoms around it. It is displayed on a dark background, mimicking the night when eyeblossoms bloom.

== Distribution ==
{{main|Eerie Mojang Office Party#Challenges|title1=Eerie Mojang Office Party}}
The Mojang Office cape was obtained by completing all five daily challenges in the [[Eerie Mojang Office Party]] event server.

== History ==
{{HistoryTable
|{{HistoryLine||November 25, 2024|link=none|This cape was first mentioned on November 25, 2024 on the code redemption section of Minecraft's website.<ref>https://web.archive.org/web/20241125192214/https://www.minecraft.net/en-us/redeem</ref> At the time, it was called the "Eyeblossom Cape". The text implied that by purchasing a [https://shop.minecraft.net/products/minecraft-creeper-adult-cape Creeper Cape] in any size from [https://shop.minecraft.net/ The Official Shop of Minecraft], an in-game Eyeblossom Cape would be received. It was removed a few hours later.}}
|{{HistoryLine||November 28, 2024|link=none|Some players note that the store page for the Creeper Cape was updated to include the information that purchasing this cape would unlock an exclusive in-game cape on December 7th, 2024.<ref>https://x.com/NotPixel86/status/1861898459864813648</ref>}}
|{{HistoryLine||December 2, 2024|link=none|The text about purchasing the cape granting an in-game one is removed from the store page.<ref>https://x.com/GGuiaugs/status/1863652122069213417</ref> It is later replaced with a promotion including a [[Character Creator|Bedrock Character Creator]] item.<ref>https://web.archive.org/web/20241211195312/https://shop.minecraft.net/products/minecraft-creeper-adult-cape</ref>}}
|{{HistoryLine||December 9, 2024|link=none|The Eerie Mojang Office Party event server starts.}}
|{{HistoryLine||December 13, 2024|link=none|The final daily challenge is revealed, making the cape obtainable.}}
|{{HistoryLine||December 20, 2024|link=none|The Eerie Mojang Office Party event server ends.}}}}

== Trivia ==
* It has also been referred to as the '''Eyeblossom Cape''' in official media.
